findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `AnyswapV5ERC20` contract, there is a privileged `vault` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol- wide operations.

findings.title: Improved Validation Of Function Arguments
findings.description: The `setVault()` function in the `AnyswapV5ERC20` contract does not validate the input `_vault` parameter, which could lead to the privileged account being forever lost if an invalid address is provided.
